phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather comes fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Oh, crap...
What is the matter?
I forgot to bring the materials for my presentation today.
That really blows.
Did you leave them in your room?
Uh-huh, I put it all together in a pile last night and...
I will go fetch them for you.
Huh?
Hey!
Wait a minute!
Belldandy?
What is he up to?
Belldandy?
Will she be all right?
Ah!
Living Under One Roof Together
Oh, whatever.
If she cannot find it, she will just come back, right?
Look at you, Morisato.
Did Belldandy dump you or something?
No, she did not.
Huh?
Did you get dumped?
No, for god's sake!
What is up, you had a fight with Bell-chan?
Can I sit by myself for a second?
Why is everybody reacting this way?
Ahem.
What is the problem, Morisato?
You look depressed.
Hey, where is Belldandy?
So now you are joining in, too.
Belldandy's just...
Lucky you, Morisato.
Getting yourself such a good-looking girlfriend!
Lucky you, Morisato.
Getting yourself such a sweet girlfriend!
But, uh, Belldandy and I are...
What the...
Is it possible?
You have already gone that far?
Dai-chan!
Den-chan!
Dai-chan!
We will gladly bear the responsibility of finding the right name for your child!
You said it!
Wait a second, will you?
This is not to be taken lightly...
We will get back to you after giving it some serious thought.
Just leave it to us!
A name...
What kind of name...
I do not believe those two!
Hey, that was pretty quick...
Whoops!
Miss Mishima?
Good morning, Mr. Morisato.
Good morning.
How unusual for you not to be with Belldandy...
Oh, well, I left something at home, and she went back to get it for me.
At home?
You mean, your home?
Yeah, I guess you could say that.
See, I just got kicked out of the dorm.
So you live alone now?
Well, uh, not alone, actually...
Huh?
Do not tell me that...
I did not tell you?
I had no idea that you and Belldandy were that involved already!
What?
Come on!
Keep your voice down, will you?
But, is it true?
Well, I guess you could say it is.
She looks so sweet, but she is as bold as the next person...
But look, we just live together, that is all.
There is really nothing going on.
What?
Nothing going on?
You have got to be kidding me!
There is nothing to kid about, and besides, I think you got the wrong idea.
Belldandy and I are just...
You two are?
Well, see, you know...
How should I put it...
I do not believe you!
You are not in grade school anymore!
I just want to take it slow... not jump into things.
With an attitude like that...
Still, considering you once dared to make a bid for me, that girl should be...
You really think so?
The first thing you have to do is tell her how you really feel.
For the rest, you can come up with it on your own, cannot you?
True, exactly what kind of relationship are we in right now?
Sorry to keep you waiting!
That was pretty quick of you, huh?
Yes.
I was not sure which ones you needed, so I brought everything.
Oh, thanks.
They are heavy, so please take care.
Sure, I will be fine.
Hey, listen...
What is it?
Um, the thing is... you and me...
Oh, never mind, it is nothing.
Keiichi?
The engine evolved as the double-valve system and was gradually improved.
Early engines used direct exhaust valves with camshafts, valves...
She is pretty cute, huh?
She did say she would stay with me forever, but...
Well, no, not necessarily!
Belldandy has not shown any signs that she does not want to be with me.
I really wish I could find out for sure.
Keiichi?
Keiichi?...tell her how you really feel.
That is it.
This is something that I have to take the initiative on, right?
Tell Belldandy that I lo... lo...
You got that, Morisato?
Love her!
Oh, please!
So you love cylinder heads to that extent, do you?
Y-Yes...
Jeez, what is he thinking?
I had to go and do it, did not I?
I made a complete fool of myself!
But the thing is, I really am in love with Belldandy.
If I can just tell her how I feel, and all goes well...
Belldandy...
Keiichi...
No, wait, come on.
We are living together, after all...
We can do something more mature.
Keiichi.
Huh?
I have warmed up the bed for you!
Oh, uh, thanks.
No, that is not right!
I do not have those depraved thoughts!
All I want...
All I want is for Belldandy to go out with me.
All right, then!
But how do I do this?
What am I supposed to say?
Should I just be straightforward and ask her to go out with me?
But that did not work with Miss Mishima...
Actually, is not what I am doing just another form of'night-creeping'?
Oh, man, what should I do?
If it was going to come to this...
But no...
How could I shackle Belldandy with a wish like that?
No other way but to go tell her myself...
Aww, I cannot do it after all.
Ne xt, this just in...
Late last night there was...
Were you working on another report?
Yeah, that is right.
I got so much done, see...
Hey, this is really good!
I am glad to hear that.
But, since you have no classes today...
Yeah.
I guess I can take a nap later on.
Would you like to go on a museum tour with me?
I am sorry.
That would be a breach of contract.
Keiichi?
Keiichi?
You have a call from Mr. Tamiya.
Oh, I must have fallen asleep, huh?
Thank God it was just a dream!
He said he had something important to talk to you about.
Huh?
I cannot believe he was really thinking up names for our kid.
Keiichi!
Dinner will be ready soon.
So please wait.
Uh, sure.
She is good-looking, she is sweet, and she is a great cook...
What else could a guy ask for?
But if I confess my feelings and it does not work out...
Forgive me, Keiichi!
Oh, crap!
What should I do?
I am going to give it a shot.
Because I never want to lose sight of that smile of hers!
Easier said than done, though... what should I do?
I guess it would be better to take the right steps...
But I got laughed at when I tried to go out with Miss Mishima.
And it is not like I have all these techniques at my disposal...
Techniques?
It is got to be around here somewhere!
Uh... let me see...
Was it this box?
I could have sworn...
Damn, the seniors just dumped it all in every which way!
Hold it... hold it... found it!
The'Surefire Techniques for Love' how-to book I bought ages ago!
Now I am all set!
Kiss Belldandy?
Kisu?
Would you like kisu fish for your dinner?
Forget it... forget it!
Cleaning up?
Yeah, that is right!
Then I will help you later on, all right?
Dinner will be ready soon.
It will not be much longer!
Man, I knew it...
I am nowhere near the kissing stage yet.
Confess your feelings at a restaurant that has a beautiful night view...
Sir?
I am afraid our establishment requires formal wear for all its patrons.
Well, we can just have dinner right here.
So that is a pass.
You should confess in a romantic environment...
Keiichi?
I should have known that was too much to ask of this place!
Not exactly what you would call romantic, huh?
Wait!
That is it!
Found'them!
Candles
Well, better than nothing...
And I need some romantic music.
Heavy metal, Western pop singers, stand-up comedy, rakugo...
Damn, I guess I am not the romantic type of guy!
Keiichi?
B-Belldandy!
Keiichi, are you not feeling well?
Belldandy, come to think of it, you can read peoples' minds, cannot you?
Yes.
Damn!
That means my plans to confess were all for nothing!
Although I can only see your emotions as different colors.
And I have to really look for it, too.
Is that right?
Yes.
An angry person appears to be red... blue when he is sad...
I can see it as a vague whirlpool of colors.
Oh, no, Keiichi seems a bit blue.
Now he is back to yellow.
My powers as a goddess have been...
Is that right?
That is all I need to know!
Dinner is ready now, so please come to the table!
I will be right there, so just hold on a second!
Okay... um...
What is this?
I did not know I had this...
Oh, I know, it must be the seniors'.
It got thrown in by mistake.
Great, this is perfect!
I see orange, he is a bit excited...
Um, Keiichi, is something the matter?
Huh?
No, nothing's the matter.
What a lovely song.
Yeah.
Keiichi is all yellow with joy now.
I am so glad!
This is no time to be eating!
Belldandy...
Yes?
Uh... could you come with me somewhere?
My, how lovely!
I am all set to go now!
All I have to do now is tell Belldandy how I feel about her!
What is this?
My seniors setting me up again?
What was I thinking, going by that how-to book?
What is wrong with just being myself?
Blue...
Did something happen to make Keiichi sad?
Wait, now he is orange again.
B-Belldandy...
Yes?
Uh, the thing is...
I know it must sound weird to say this when we are living together...
I have something I want to tell you!
Heart rate 150 bpm, blood pressure 170!
I have something I want to tell you!
And still on the rise...
His temperature's 101!
This is terrible!
Belldandy?
Keiichi, you must rest now!
No, wait, I am not sick...
Please do not talk now.
Your pulse is racing and you have a fever.
Your blood pressure's surging!
Your face is red and you are sweating.
This is what they call illness, is not it?
I told you, I am not sick!
I am starting to lose consciousness...
Dammit, I cannot let this stop me from...
I have got to...
Belldandy!
Belldandy...
Yes?
This has nothing to do with the contract, okay?
Just like any guy and girl, I want you to go out with me, see...
Keiichi!
So that is why you have been acting so strange since yesterday.
Keiichi...
It is true that I came to you on a mission from...
But there is no more deceit in my feelings than there is in yours.
I want you to be happy, Keiichi!
And that is more than a feeling... it is my own wish for you.
Sure...
I should have seen it from the start.
Whether we go out, or do not go out, or how it looks to other people...
It does not really matter, because after all, Belldandy...
Let us go, then, Belldandy!
All right!
One day when I woke up...
A day like any other... another one just beginning.
There you are, yawning... your face is still so sleepy.
Because each peaceful day we share is a miracle to me.
This is where my heart will always return...
Forever...
There is only one thing I wish for.
I chase after the same dream, wherever it may go.
The love I feel for you gives me strength.
May tomorrow be as joyful as today...
That is my wish...
The young girl has left her hometown to make a new start in a new land.
Not knowing that she might shatter the peaceful life of a goddess and a human!
Next episode: Ah! A Blessing in Every Bargain?
What?
We have to go house-hunting again?
